To experience Eyowo, just input your phone number and you will instantly get credited if you have never used Eyowo previously.

Eyowo for Business (Merchants)

What Is Eyowo?

Eyowo is a payment experience which provides friends, family and businesses with a convenient and secure means to pay each other without using cash or cheques on the go. Eyowo can also be used to purchase items from featured nearby stores. Beyond payment and purchases, Eyowo allows you book and pay for tickets.

I’m interested in accepting payments using Eyowo. How do I go about this?

We appreciate your interest in using Eyowo to accept payments for your business. With the Eyowo Merchant App, your customers can now easily pay you without any hassles. Your customers are promised an intuitive and effective user experience. Fast and reliable transactions are assured in just a few taps. Join the league of businesses that accept payments from Eyowo. This further creates exposure for your brand when your clients share their Eyowo experiences

Register/Sign In as a Merchant

Eyowo as a Business (Agents)

Eyowo’s Points Of Contact help push our financial inclusion narrative by assisting the unbanked or the underbanked.

The Points Of Contact also serve as an income generator for our various agents through the sales of airtime and bills.

Eyowo As A Business provides funding and withdrawal functions for all those on Eyowo without bank accounts using the Agent Cash Out function on the app.

Our various Points Of Contact also sell airtime and bills. This simply means that with Eyowo you can pay your bills and buy airtime without evening owning a bank account.

Register/Sign In as an Agent

CHANGING LIVES. CREATING OPPORTUNITIES

Eyowo’s amazing user experience and ease of use makes it the best payment solution tool available. What Eyowo offers is more than just payment transactions In reality, it is a whole new experience.

Download Till app and agent app

Getting started with Eyowo

Eyowo eliminates the hassles associated with making payments online and offline. With Eyowo, you can transfer and receive cash whenever and however. You no longer have to worry about long queues, tedious processes and crappy internet connectivity.
